Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory730.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Jumping onto the stage, Vera stamps the floor, bored.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I shouldn't expect a Corrupted or something jumping out of here, should I?", 4: '1'}
{2: "There shouldn't be any Corrupted here.", 3: '7'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Although my time with you isn't exactly boring, a maze this devoid of danger is...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "It's so safe it makes me uncomfortable.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera leans onto the pillar lazily, staring at her surroundings.'}
{2: "You look like you don't like it here, Vera.", 3: '14'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "This kind of place isn't for me. I don't like this girly color, either.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: '"Romance," "flowers," "balloons"... Ha.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "But it's fun to spend time with you on these trivial minigames occasionally, I suppose.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera turns around and grins, glancing at you with the corner of her eyes.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Do you want to do something interesting instead?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'What—are—you—thinking—about?!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Before you realize it, Vera's face is in front of yours. She curls her finger and flicks you on your forehead mercilessly."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You can only invite me if there's another event like this.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I thought you didn't like it.", 3: '28', 4: 'How greedy.', 5: '29'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Ha, you moron.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "What's wrong with that?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Just make sure you remember it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'You can only invite me to these "themed events."', 4: '1'}
